# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
NAFC Paving Phase 2 - St. John's, NL

## Background Information
This tender is for the provision of paving services for the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre (NAFC) in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador. The project involves the removal of existing asphalt, milling, and the supply and installation of new asphalt paving.

| Closing Date | 2022-10-27T14:00:00 |
| Unspsc        | 30121601 (Asphalt) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Selective tendering    |
